item.title: OpenStack Summit 2014 in Atlanta - Report
item.author: Abdel Raoof
item.description:
As usually I reported about the talks I joined during the participation at the summit in Atlanta.

For this time I created several slides with the main points of each talk and the slide are available at (http://fmarco76.github.io/AtlantaSummit2014).
